LocaleLayout.title: ⴰⴷⵍⵉⵙ
LocaleLayout.description: ⴰⵏⴼⵉⵙ ⵏ ⵉⴳⵍⴷⴰⵏ ⴷ ⵉⵇⵇⵔⴰⵏ ⵜⵎⴰⵣⵉⵖⵜ, ⴰⵡⵓⵔ ⵉⵎⵖⵔⴰⵏ ⴰⴷ ⵙⵍⴰⵡⴰⵏ ⵜⵎⴰⵣⵉⵖⵜ ⴷ ⵜⴰⵎⵓⵔⴰⵙⵜ, ⴰⵏⴼⴰⵡⵉ ⵏ ⵜⵎⴰⵣⵉⵖⵜ ⵓⴷⵍⵉⵙⵏ

Auth.authTitle: {action, select, SIGN_IN {Welcome back to Adlis} SIGN_UP {Join Adlis} FORGOT_PASSWORD {Forgot your password?} other {}}
Auth.authDescription: {action, select, SIGN_IN {Sign in to your account to continue.} SIGN_UP {By uploading a valid ID during signup, you unlock full borrowing privileges and can start borrowing books immediately. If you choose not to upload your ID, you will still have access to all our titles, but you'll only be able to download them.} FORGOT_PASSWORD {Enter your email below, and you'll receive instructions on how to reset your password shortly.} other {}}
Auth.authAlternateText: {action, select, SIGN_IN {New to Adlis?} other {Already registered?}}
Auth.authAlternateAction: {action, select, SIGN_IN {Create an account} other {Sign in to your account}}
Auth.authAction: {action, select, SIGN_IN {Sign In} SIGN_UP {Create account} FORGOT_PASSWORD {Start recovery} other {}}
